entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023
